de.mrapp.android.adapter.view

Class ExpandableGridView

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.mrapp.android.adapter.view.ExpandableGridView

  • public class ExpandableGridView
extends java.lang.Object
    A grid view, which can contain multiple groups, which can individually be expanded to show their children.
    Since:
    0.5.0

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  ExpandableGridView.OnChildClickListener
      Defines the interface, a class, which should be notified, when a child of an expandable grid view has been clicked, must implement.
      static interface  ExpandableGridView.OnGroupClickListener
      Defines the interface, a class, which should be notified, when a group of an expandable grid view has been clicked, must implement.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int PACKED_POSITION_TYPE_CHILD
      The type of the packed position, which represents a child.
      static int PACKED_POSITION_TYPE_GROUP
      The type of a packed position, which represents a group.
      static int PACKED_POSITION_TYPE_NULL
      The type of the packed position, which represents a neither/null/no preference.
      static long PACKED_POSITION_VALUE_NULL
      The value for a packed position that represents neither/null/no preference.

    • Field Detail

      • PACKED_POSITION_TYPE_GROUP

        public static final int PACKED_POSITION_TYPE_GROUP
        The type of a packed position, which represents a group.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PACKED_POSITION_TYPE_CHILD

        public static final int PACKED_POSITION_TYPE_CHILD
        The type of the packed position, which represents a child.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PACKED_POSITION_TYPE_NULL

        public static final int PACKED_POSITION_TYPE_NULL
        The type of the packed position, which represents a neither/null/no preference.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PACKED_POSITION_VALUE_NULL

        public static final long PACKED_POSITION_VALUE_NULL
        The value for a packed position that represents neither/null/no preference. This value is not otherwise possible since a group type (first bit 0) should not have a child position filled.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

                          Context context)

        Parameters:

        attributeSet - The attribute set, the view's attributes should be obtained from, as an instance of the type AttributeSet or null, if no attributes should be obtained

      • ExpandableGridView

        public ExpandableGridView(@NonNull
                          Context context,
                          @Nullable
                          AttributeSet attributeSet,
                          @AttrRes
                          int defaultStyle)
        Creates a new grid view, which can contain multiple groups, which can individually be expanded to show their children.
        Parameters:
        context - The context, which should be used by the view, as an instance of the class Context. The context may not be null
        attributeSet - The attribute set, the view's attributes should be obtained from, as an instance of the type AttributeSet or null, if no attributes should be obtained
        defaultStyle - The default style to apply to this view. If 0, no style will be applied (beyond what is included in the theme). This may either be an attribute resource, whose value will be retrieved from the current theme, or an explicit style resource

      • ExpandableGridView

        public ExpandableGridView(@NonNull
                          Context context,
                          @Nullable
                          AttributeSet attributeSet,
                          int defaultStyle,
                          @StyleRes
                          int defaultStyleResource)
        Creates a new grid view, which can contain multiple groups, which can individually be expanded to show their children.
        Parameters:
        context - The context, which should be used by the view, as an instance of the class Context. The context may not be null
        attributeSet - The attribute set, the view's attributes should be obtained from, as an instance of the type AttributeSet or null, if no attributes should be obtained
        defaultStyle - The default style to apply to this view. If 0, no style will be applied (beyond what is included in the theme). This may either be an attribute resource, whose value will be retrieved from the current theme, or an explicit style resource
        defaultStyleResource - A resource identifier of a style resource that supplies default values for the view, used only if the default style is 0 or can not be found in the theme. Can be 0 to not look for defaults

    • Method Detail

      • getPackedPositionType

        public static int getPackedPositionType(long packedPosition)
        Returns the type of the item, which corresponds to a specific packed position.
        Parameters:
        packedPosition - The packed position of the item, whose type should be returned, as an Integer value
        Returns:
        The type of the item, which corresponds to the given packed position, as an Integer value. The type may either be PACKED_POSITION_TYPE_GROUP, PACKED_POSITION_TYPE_CHILD or PACKED_POSITION_TYPE_NULL

      • getPackedPositionGroup

        public static int getPackedPositionGroup(long packedPosition)
        Returns the index of the group, which corresponds to a specific packed position.
        Parameters:
        packedPosition - The packed position of the group, whose index should be returned, as an Integer value
        Returns:
        The index of the group, which corresponds to the given packed position, as an Integer value or -1, if the packed position does not correspond to a group

      • getPackedPositionChild

        public static int getPackedPositionChild(long packedPosition)
        Returns the index of the child, which corresponds to a specific packed position.
        Parameters:
        packedPosition - The packed position of the child, whose index should be returned, as an Integer value
        Returns:
        The index of the child, which corresponds to the given packed position, as an Integer value or -1, if the packed position does not correspond to a child

      • getPackedPositionForGroup

        public static long getPackedPositionForGroup(int groupIndex)
        Returns the packed position of a group, which corresponds to a specific index.
        Parameters:
        groupIndex - The index of the group, whose packed position should be returned, as an Integer value
        Returns:
        The packed position of the group, which corresponds to the given index, as an Integer value

      • getPackedPositionForChild

        public static long getPackedPositionForChild(int groupIndex,
                                             int childIndex)
        Returns the packed position of a child, which corresponds to a specific group and child index.
        Parameters:
        groupIndex - The index of the group, the child, whose packed position should be returned, belongs to, as an Integer value
        childIndex - The index of the child, whose packed position should be returned, as an Integer value
        Returns:
        The packed position of the child, which corresponds to the given group and child index, as an Integer value

      • isGroupExpanded

        public final boolean isGroupExpanded(int groupIndex)
        Returns, whether the group, which corresponds to a specific index, is currently expanded, or not.
        Parameters:
        groupIndex - The index, of the group, whose expansion should be checked, as an Integer value
        Returns:
        True, if the group is currently expanded, false otherwise

      • expandGroup

        public final boolean expandGroup(int groupIndex)
        Expands the group, which corresponds to a specific index.
        Parameters:
        groupIndex - The index of the group, which should be expanded, as an Integer value
        Returns:
        True, if the group has been expanded, false otherwise

        public final boolean collapseGroup(int groupIndex)
        Collapses the group, which corresponds to a specific index.
        Parameters:
        groupIndex - The index of the group, which should be collapsed, as an Integer value
        Returns:
        True if the group has been collapsed, false otherwise
